spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning roughly matches (open kitchen/living on left, bedroom top-right, service core center-right, stair zone right), but multiple plan-to-render mismatches exist: several plan doors are missing or converted to open passages (E1/E2), the small room with two single beds shown in the 2D plan is not present as a defined room in 3D (E1), bedroom window count/locations do not match (extra bedroom window in 3D) (E5/E2), and internal proportions around the central corridor/service core appear expanded in 3D, shifting dining placement and circulation widths (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is partially correct (kitchen adjacent to living; bedroom adjacent to corridor; stair zone on right), but fidelity is reduced by: missing enclosed room (two-bed room) from the plan (E1), missing door leaves/incorrect door embedding at key connections (living↔bedroom, corridor↔bath, main entry) (E1/E2), and an added/hallucinated bedroom window not indicated on the 2D plan (E5). Wall thickness looks generally consistent, but several openings do not correspond to the plan’s door positions.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen layout (L-shape + island) is broadly similar, but dining and living furniture do not match plan placement (dining appears shifted toward the service core; sofa/coffee table placement differs) (E2). Some furniture scale/proportion is plausible, but room size shifts make furnishings read inconsistently relative to the plan (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with decent lighting and tidy geometry. However, it appears to use perspective rather than a strict orthographic/isometric projection (minor camera/projection deviation) (E6). Overall visual clarity is good.

detected_errors.description: Missing enclosed room shown in 2D plan with two single beds (bottom-center area); 3D does not depict it as a separate bedroom/room.
Missing door leaves/defined doors for multiple plan-indicated doorways (e.g., living↔bedroom and corridor↔bath appear as open passages in 3D rather than doors).
Main entry door at bottom-right of the 2D plan is not clearly represented/embedded as a door element in the 3D render.
Hallucinated/extra bedroom window in 3D (bedroom shows two windows), while the 2D plan indicates fewer/different bedroom window placement.
Window placement/count along exterior walls does not consistently match the 2D plan (some openings appear shifted or added/removed).
Proportion distortion in the central corridor/service core area: widths/room sizes appear altered, affecting circulation and furniture fit compared with the 2D plan.
Dining/living furniture placement differs from the 2D plan (dining table location and living seating arrangement shifted).
Render is not strictly orthographic/isometric; perspective is present, reducing projection accuracy.
